__e: I know that you're a phoney and you know that you are.

I don't want any part in this 'happy family' sham.
You are a high-class cheat, all talk and no work.
I've come to ask... that you call off this farce of a wedding before it's too late.
Do you mind telling me what kind of fucking charade ends with somebody turning up dead?
What kind of a farce is this, when you have so much to explain?
